questions.question: Flash runs 3 rings/sec. How many in 5 seconds?
questions.hint: Multiply rings per second by number of seconds

questions.question: Deku loses 25 power points from 100. How much left?
questions.hint: Subtract the lost points from the total

questions.question: 2 punches (15) + 1 kick (25). How many points lost?
questions.hint: Calculate each punch and kick separately then add them

questions.question: What is 1/2 of 10?
questions.hint: Multiply the fraction by the number

questions.question: Bakugo spends 4 energy units in battle, how many after 10 units?
questions.hint: Subtract the decimal from the total

questions.question: A villain hides in one of 3 caves. He isn’t in Cave 1 or Cave 2. Where is he?
All Might defeats 8 villains/hr. How many in 3 hours?
questions.hint: Multiply villains per hour by number of hours

questions.question: 3 team members with 120 power each. What is total power?
questions.hint: Multiply power points by team size

questions.question: 5 floors, 7 rooms each. Total rooms?
questions.hint: Multiply floors by rooms per floor

questions.question: Midoriya uses 3/4 of his 100 power. How much used?
questions.hint: Multiply the fraction by total power

questions.question: A laser gun drains 2.5 units per shot. How much for 4 shots?
questions.hint: Multiply decimal by number of shots

questions.question: Hero sees 2 clues: red means danger, blue means trap. Green means?
questions.hint: Green is neither danger nor trap
